name: Spiderfoot (Docker)
description:
Launch spiderfoot web server using this command:

docker run -p 5001:5001 -d spiderfoot

Official tutorial:  https://www.spiderfoot.net/a-simpler-way-to-get-spiderfoot-running-is-to-use-docker/
Video walkthrough of installing Spiderfoot in Docker: https://asciinema.org/a/165187

After Spiderfoot is running, point your browser to http://127.0.0.1:5001/
